A Fusion of Excitement and Serenity…
In the center of it all

The A.Venue Hotel Suites offers a timeless enclave of elegance and luxury catering to the most discriminating of tastes. It has world-class deluxe hotel amenities and impeccable service including gym and fitness center, infinity pool and function rooms to guarantee a totally relaxing and stress-free sojourn for travelers. A.Venue Hotel Suites evokes an unmistakable ambience of personal indulgence, ultimate wellness and immeasurable joie de vivre in a place one can proudly call home.
The A.Venue Hotel Suites - A Genesis Hotel Antel Lifestyle City, 7829 Makati Avenue, Makati City
Free Handmade Flatbread Pizza of your choice When spending PhP 1,000 or more
Rated as the Best Restaurant in Cebu for 2 years in a Row...
Marvelous food in front of a sweeping sea vista

Abacá provides a full Mediterranean inspired restaurant and bar featuring the cuisine of Chef-owner Jason Hyatt. Chef Jason’s experience on four continents has helped him to create a startlingly complete menu of healthy cuisine to enhance your visit. Relax with sweeping sea vistas while dining on the freshest local fish and seafood and imported meats and cheeses from around the world. Taste the freshness of the organic herbs and vegetables grown in Abacá’s own gardens. The menu from Chef Jason includes wood fired oven roasted meats and seafood, handmade pizzas and pastas, freshly baked breads, tapas and a wide array of salads and appetizers.
Punta Engaño Road, Mactan Island, Lapu-Lapu City
Complimentary 30 Minute Foot Massage When staying 2 nights or more (prebooking required)
Lush tropical foliage and panoramic ocean views

Abacá provides space for only a few guests to experience relaxation in their very own private getaway. The six deluxe suites and three villas with their ethnic touches are intended primarily to reflect the beauty of their surroundings. Enjoy the classic, elegant style of the tropics with accents on warm dark woods and natural stones. Enjoy panoramic ocean views from the privacy of your terrace or garden, custom-made for a private breakfast or dinner. Awake relaxed and feel the beautiful first rays of sunrise casting a veil of light over the ocean front.
Punta Engaño Road, Mactan Island, Lapu-Lapu City
One free dessert when spending PhP 1,000 or more, Dessert may not be claimed together with the voucher.
Complimentary Dessert of Choice When you order Abe’s Chicken Supreme
Gourmet dishes inspired by Pampanga and the World

Abe (ah-beh) is the restaurant dedicated to Larry’s Cruz’s father, the late artist-writer, gourmet and bon vivant E. Aguilar “Abe” Cruz. The restaurant serves traditional Filipino food, mostly of Capampangan origin, and gourmet dishes inspired by Abe’s travels around the world. At Abe, food is prepared and served with a great deal of love while its concept and design provide the ideal setting for friends and family who wish to dine comfortably and have a good time. Among the restaurant’s specialties are: Abe’s Chicken Supreme, Lamb Adobo with Popped Garlic and Knockout Knuckle.
Level M3, Trinoma, Edsa corner North Ave.,Quezon City
Buy One Take One Set Dinner When you stay overnight at Abe’s Farm (pre-booking required)
In the foothills of Mount Arayat

In the heart of Pampanga, in the foothills of the dormant volcano Mt. Arayat, nestles a new lifestyle destination. Get away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Come for a relaxing afternoon or stay overnight in a dreamy bamboo and antique wood rest house. Have a reinvigorating therapeutic afternoon spa treatment in a cozy Ifugao ulog built for two. And best of all, enjoy the culinary delights of Abe Restaurant daily except Tuesdays. For inquiries and reservations, call 7107423, (045) 8651930.

Personalized Coaching Where Learning Makes a Difference…
An entity for learning, teaching, and discovering

ASAP is an educational organization that matches participants to trainers after assessing carefully the needs of the students, learning style, and schedule. ASAP offer classes for English, Foreign languages, martitime English, Conversational Skills, business and technical English, online tutorials, English camps, and more. ASAP is more than teaching. It’s about helping people by showing them our treasures and allowing them to discover their own.
Units 1805-06 Cityland Pasong Tamo Tower 2210 Don Chino Roces Avenue, Makati City 1231, Philippines

Visit top dive destinations in the Philippines

Adventure Bound arranges tours to top dive destinations in the Philippines. If it’s diving with mantas at Manta Bowl, swimming with the whale sharks of Donsol, swimming alongside large schools of jacks and barracuda at Apo Island and Bohol or dive UNESCO’s Tubbataha Reefs, let Adventure Bound take you there. Want to design your own multiple destination travel plans? Let us plan it along with you.
Unit 4 and 5, La Fuerza Plaza 2, Sabio Street, Barangay San Lorenzo, Makati

The Best Rubber Flip-flops in the World…
Enjoy the original styles of the world's favorite flip-flops brand at this exclusive Havaianas boutique

Created in the sunny shores of Brazil in 1962, Havaianas is an icon for the carefree, casual lifestyle inspired by the caress of a fresh breeze and the feel of warm sand against bare feet. The embodiment of casual ease and luxurious joy, this pioneer in the global flip-flops industry holds a special place in the hearts (and feet) of Filipinos.

Better Vision for a Better World…

The American Eye Center (AEC) is a full service, world class diagnostic, therapeutic and surgical eye facility with the most advanced equipment for the early detection, monitoring and treatment of all eye diseases. It is manned by the country’s most experienced eye experts, making American Eye Center the most trusted eye center today. Since 1995, AEC has performed surgery on over 35,000 eyes, changing the way people see the world. A team of highly qualified Eye MD’s, Optometrists, Nurses and Counsellors are always on hand to provide patients with personalized quality eye care.

A gastronomic adventure for the sophisticated palate

Hailed by the New York Times as one of the founders of “New Mediterranean Cuisine”, Chef Marco Anzani introduces coastal Mediterranean flavors with a spin with this namesake establishment. Awaken the epicurean in you through red plate creations whipped up by the 3-Michelin starred chef in its private dining rooms. Share a bottle of your favorite vino selected from its 1,250 bottle underground cellar. Then sit back and relax in the old world charm of interiors by world-renowned Cebuano designers. This is Anzani, redefining what a dining experience should be.
Panorama Heights, Nivel Hills, Lahug, Cebu City, Philippines

GE Appliances offer the best in contemporary design matched with the latest kitchen technologies. Every appliance displays a sleek, cosmopolitan and modern look that matches your every last taste in the kitchen and home. Ariston’s philosphy is simple - to become part of everyday life taking Care of you, offering domestic appliances unique in Style, giving your house a fi ne touch of design. Ariston appliances are studied to guarantee quality and performance: they are able to work in total safety and silence in order to accommodate any need you could have.

The Philippine's Largest and Finest Chain of Antique Galleries…
Over 5,000 pieces of authentic antiques from the Ming and Qing dynasties including jade and ivory art pieces, furniture, accessories and paintings

Arts of Asia offers a remarkable collection of Chinese furniture and curios. The antique shop offers a wide selection of classical and contemporary Chinese furniture in zitan wood, huang huali, jichi wood, old rosewood, teak wood, elm wood, nanwood, walnut wood and beech wood. The hand selected antique pieces range from book cabinets, folding chairs, console tables, altar tables, coffee tables, stools, canopy beds, louhan beds, matrimonial chests and apothecary cabinets. The pieces make a wonderful addition to any setting.

Drinks, delicious European cuisine and a cozy ambience for great nights

Fresh off its recent first year anniversary party, Attica has been gaining quite the reputation as one of the must-stop bars at the A-Venue Complex along Makati Avenue. Known for its popular nights throughout the week like Acoustica Open Mic Wednesdays, Technoshock Thursdays and its Top Mash-Up Hiphop sounds during the weekend. Don’t miss the Macho Margarita drink, a gigantic martini glass that can easily quench 7 people’s thirst. With its cozy Victorian-inspired interiors, Attica is a bar that gives off a different feel compared to any other. Delicious European cuisine adds to the flavor that Attica gives.
Unit F-110 A. Venue Events Mall, Makati Avenue, Makati

Grilling the best ribs in Alabang

Aussie Café and Resto is an Australian-in-spired restaurant in Alabang that serves Sydney's more popular grills, gourmet sandwiches, and Mediterranean dishes. Its cozy yet modern ambience, good food, and warm service…all at very affordable prices make it a totally unique "Southern" experience. What's more, the resto serves the best Aussie-style coffee and has free internet access. A list of its appetizing and flavorsome dishes include the ever famouse Chef Bernie's Mouthwatring Ribs, Bushtucker Eye Fillet Steaks, Grilled Apple and Veggie Sandwich, the Aussie Big Breakfast, and many more.
BCGROUP Center Building B27 L2B Filinvest Ave. Filinvest Corporate City, Alabang Muntinlupa 1780

Now, you can partake in the old world charm of authentic Tuscan cooking with Balducci. Among their impressive offerings are the Pizza Rustica (authentic Florentine pizza baked to order in a wood fired oven) and Bistecca Florentina (made from certified Chianina beef, one of the oldest breeds of cattle in the world imported from Florence). At Balducci, enjoyment can be found either in simple meals or in gourmet pasta dishes with complex wines that will excite even the most seasoned connoisseurs.

A wide array of international cuisines can be enoyed at Basix's all-day dining restaurant, including dishes cooked a la minute by chefs at the surf and turf, wok and noodle stations. Guests may also enjoy fresh oysters, sushi, homemade noodles and a wide variety of salads, appetizers, and international hot dishes. there's also a grilling and carving station. Once you have enjoyed your selecion from the multicultural buffet, visit the huge and sumptuous display of desserts which include fresh fruits, assorted cakes and pastries, homemade ic cream and a crepe station where fresh crepes are whisked up while you wait.

A sweet escape from city bustle where good drinks and good company mix

Bellini with its magnificent views of Cebu City is both chic and quaint, the merging of old world European charm and a plush tropical paradise. Just like its namesake drink, this place is meant to be a sweet escape from the urban jungle where one can unwind, relax, and have great drinks with even better conversations. Its New Mediterranean cocktail menu offers an extensive selection of champagne, sparkling, and rose sparkling concoctions. Theme nights gather together crowds with varying tastes and lifestyles – from expats to ladies who lunch, to young movers and shakers.

Catch a distinct taste of Chinese food

In the mood for Chinese food? Big Mao Chinese Bistro is the place to go to. It’s a modern Chinese restaurant with a touch of contemporary zen interior design. The menu at Big Mao is a fusion of classic favorites and some creative new twists. Yang chow fried rice, seafood noodles, spare ribs, chinese fried chicken are just some of the menu items. Big Mao is known for its signature Min Min’s Prawn Roulade, a delicious new take on prawns with nori. Not to be missed is the Ostrich in Chinese style sauce, which hits all the right notes.

Filipino home-style cooking that is sire to impress

If you want to impress your balikbayan and foreign visitors with Pinoy home-style cooking, you are at the right place. The dining area of Bistro Remedios is filled with remnants of an old Spanish home accentuated with original paintings of celebrated artists. The menu serves appetizing Filipino fares such as binukadkad na pla-pla, crispy tadyang d’ original, sugpo sa aligue, oxtail kare kare, and bamboo rice.

Manila's premiere patisserie boasting of world class Parisian-styled pastry creations

The home of the best and widest selection of Macarons de Paris in Manila, Bizu has painstakingly mastered the art of making these chewy pastel-colored almond gems with delicious crème ganache centres. Known to rival many patisserie creations in Paris, Bizu’s vitrine are lined with signature cakes (try the Samba or the Nirvana for beginners!), tarts, eclairs and chocolate truffles are a sweet lover’s delight. People rave about the best Lavazza coffee and the most tempting thick hot chocolate at Bizu Café. Savor quiches, tartines, pastas, sandwiches, or the famous 10-Hour Roast Beef. A variety of sweet and savory experiences are at your beck and call. Serving breakfast, lunch, afternoon tea, dinner and dessert.

Tajimaya, the famous chain of yakiniku restaurants in Japan is in Cebu. The ambience in Tajimaya is cozy, streamlined and surprisingly smokefree. Tajimaya uses a unique patented “smoke free char-grill” which cooks your meats just the way you want it without making you smell like it. They carry a wide selection of high quality meats which you can broil on the grill on your own or request the staff to do so should you be a bit unsure of your culinary expertise. A definite menu favorite is the Wagyu Karubi, an extremely soft and tasty cut because of the marbling. Other must tries are the Jyu Karubi and Jyu Harami. Enjoy the meats with the special sauces and with a mug of cold Japanese beer or soju.

Made to look like a train station in Lon-don, Whistlestop Restaurant showcases antique materials that brings diners back to the ambience of the 70s. Whistlestop’s varied menu offers top-selling and fine comfort food including Meaty Spaghetti Bolognese, Salisbury Steak, Hainanese Chicken Rice, Monggo soup with Chicha-ron, Steamboat soup and Nasi Goreng, Choose from a variety of house specialty dishes and others that will surely please your appetite. Opened 24/7, bring back the old days and eat the best dishes any-time, anyday at Whistlestop.

Excite your taste buds with Zing! Juice Bar’s fresh, 100% all natural fruit juices and smoothies. The extensive menu has pure healing juices, power smoothies, protein shakes, and immunity boosters. Try out the wheat grass juice for a dose of healthy anti-oxidants. Not only refreshing; it also has multiple nutritional benefits for a healthier you.
